titles.title: To reduce the Official Mail Allowance of Members of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 02/13/1995--Introduced. Amends the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1991 to change the Official Mail Allowance for Members of the House of Representatives to not more than the product of: (1) one and one-half times the single-piece rate applicable to first class mail (currently three times such rate); and (2) the number of addresses in the congressional district.
